ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am currently using Heritrix 1.14.3 Everytime, when i need to use Heritrix, I found that I need to run the following command: export

Hi, 

I am currently using Heritrix 1.14.3
Everytime, when i need to use He=
ritrix, I found that I need to run the following command:
 
export HERITRIX=
_HOME=3D/root/heritrix-1.14.3
cd $HERITIX_HOME
chmod u+x $HERITRIX_HOME/bin=
/heritrix
$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix --admin=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD --port=3D909=
0
 
Is there anyway to autostartup without typing so many commands? 
Please=
 help. 
Looking forward to hear from your answer and guidiance. 
 
 
Thanks=
 in advance.
Wilson
